Use an alarm clock as a sleep tracker: Track the duration and quality of your sleep each night.
Use an alarm clock as a personal safety device: Keep it in your bedroom and set it to go off if you don't get up in time to answer the door or phone.
Use an alarm clock as a time machine: Set it to a specific time in the past or future and use it as a visual reminder of the passage of time.
Use an alarm clock as a personal trainer: Set it to play motivational music and use it as a timer for workouts.
Use an alarm clock as a meditation tool: Set it to playumonk music and use it as a timer for meditation sessions.
